Options.Text: I active the facility's coolant injectors. The cascade continues, but the warnings become less severe. Eventually, they stop. The problem has been brought under control, though the facility is substantially less wealthy.

IncomingMessages: 空氣遭到汙染。我帶來了大量的大氣熱能，脆弱的系統無法承受。就連我指尖下的主終端站也故障了。
Alert! Alert! Power core isolated! Central artificial intelligence core endangered! Hostile environment detected!
有許多方法能夠復原系統......

Options.Name: Seal off power core
Options.Text: I safeguard the power core against the breach. However, vital control systems appear to have been damaged beyond repair. I listen to the hum of the powerplant, the only sound audible in the now inoperable facility.

Options.Name: Seal off primary motherboard
Options.Text: I seal off the facility's primary motherboard. However, vital control systems appear to have been damaged beyond repair. The entirely facility starts to shut down.

Options.Name: Seal off central AI
Options.Text: I safeguard the control units that house the facility's primary AI. With the computer running the facility, the appropriate countermeasures are soon deployed and the hostile environment purged.

IncomingMessages: 作業停止了。最近一次的研究掃描檔遭到損毀，這很可能是我不請自來惹的禍，基地系統全都發生當機。
Bad data. Sentinel drone activity scan corrupted. System disengaged.
終端站列出了可能損毀的檔案，看來我有移除的權限......

Options.Name: Delete planetary quadruped scan
Options.Text: I delete a number of files related to the quadrupeds that guard the facility, but the system remains offline

Options.Name: Delete Sentinel scan
Options.Text: I delete an unusually large file, a scan the network process that controls the nearby Sentinel drones. There is a sudden, large jump in available computational resources. The installation's primary processes begin to restart.

Options.Name: Delete geological survey
Options.Text: I delete a number of geological data packets, but the system remains offline

IncomingMessages: 失控的能量波動造成研究作業停擺。我碰了終端站想進行調查，一股殘餘的電流穿透我的強化套裝，傳至地面。
Alert! Electronic terminal operator power discharge! Reset primary interface!
終端站的數據顯示能量波動越來越猛烈，過不了多久就會造成整座設施故障。

Options.Name: Stabilise production battery
Options.Text: I attempt to stabilise the flow of power throughout the facility, but the fluctuations continue. The terminal begins to short out, then dramatically shuts down completely.

Options.Name: Reset primary terminal
Options.Text: I reset the primary interface. One by one, systems come back online. The power fluctuations cease.

IncomingMessages: 雖然警報已經啟動，系統還是超載。我腳下的配備發出急促的嗡鳴聲。終端站閃爍發出警告。
Danger! Excess power! Decrease energy use immediately! Delivery at maximum!
我聞到輕微的燒焦味......

Options.Name: Reduce power delivery levels
Options.Text: I reduce power delivery across the board. The installation returns to acceptable activity levels.

Options.Name: Increase fan power delivery
Options.Text: I turn up the cooling systems. The added strain on power delivery leads to a small internal fire. The terminal shuts down.

Options.Name: Increase coolant power delivery
Options.Text: I turn up the cooling systems. The added strain on power delivery leads to a small internal fire. The terminal shuts down.

IncomingMessages: 我走近終端站，終端站一如預期閃著保全警報，但旁邊出現了我從未看過的警告。
Unexpected biological blockage detected. Power delivery network disruption!
影片顯示有一隻小型生物爬過我下方的線路。他被警報吵醒了。這個居住地選得還真不明智。

Options.Name: Initiate power surge
Options.Text: I boost power to the wiring loom. A smell of roasted meat wafts up from the systems below. The system comes back online.

Options.Name: Flush production network
Options.Text: I send a surge of highly acidic cleaning fluid through the pipes.  The creature is swept away. I hear a faint hiss as it bubbles away to nothingness. The system comes back online.

Options.Name: Leave creature alone
Options.Text: I wait. Driven by the alarms, the creature struggles desperately for the exit. Eventually, it breaks free. The system comes back online.

IncomingMessages: 警報觸發了焚化機制，瞬間銷毀這裡使用的元素。不過使用該元素的程序仍然持續運作。
Databank back-up process stalled. Raw metal required to finish process.
我的掃描器偵測到金屬的殘留物，是先前製造程序留下的。

Options.Name: Supply metal
Options.Text: I feed the metal back into the facility's supply hopper. Production comes back online.

Options.Name: Supply metal
Options.Text: I feed the metal back into the facility's supply hopper. Production comes back online.

Options.Name: Supply metal
Options.Text: I feed the metal back into the facility's supply hopper. Production comes back online.

IncomingMessages: 終端站上顯示多張巡警無人機和步行機科技的設計圖。
Warped flesh with metal, saw the truth - the truth - the -

看來建造這座設施的人，對某種叫「漩渦箱體」的東西特別感興趣，還試圖複製其設計。

工廠深處的感應器呈現異象。仍然有某個東西潛藏在陰影中，這東西並非活物，卻也算不上死去......

Options.Name: Purge depths
Options.Text:
I use the factory's purge protocol to release a gas into the factory's depths, apparently causing the hidden creature to lie motionless.

I take what technology I can find and leave. No good can come of remaining here.

Options.Name: Take Vortex Cube
Options.Text: I take a Vortex Cube and leave. No good can come of remaining here.

Options.Name: Scan for Sentinels
Options.Text:
I initiate a scan for Sentinels. The result is incorrect... it must be. According to this scan, they are all around me, watching me even as I stand here.

I take what technology I can find and leave. No good can come of remaining here.

IncomingMessages: 看來這座工廠專門生產外星科瓦族的強化套裝替換零件，生產線不斷吐出一副副面罩、手臂、資料板，甚至還有足部零件。
Where is entity?! Transfer failure / non-existence / terminate! Transfer, transfer!
我在終端站上觀察生產線運作時，其中一副沒有身體的面罩開始尖叫。終端站等著我輸入，一旁還有倒數計時，告訴我很快就會有太空船抵達。

Options.Name: Reassure the mask
Options.Text:
I reassure the mask, telling it that a ship is on its way. I show the mask its surroundings, transmitting audiovisual data on the entire complex.
The mask appears to calm a little, but still it shakes with a deep and abiding terror. It awaits rescue.

Options.Name: Report system malfunction
Options.Text: I report a system malfunction, causing the mask to immediately grow still, purged of its individuality.

Options.Name: Cease production
Options.Text:
I initiate a shut-down of all production, causing the conveyor belt to cease movement. But soon, something else happens.
The various other limbs on the production line begin to shift, moving towards the mask as if to assemble themselves into a bipedal figure.
But they just flail past one another, some of them falling to the floor, others beginning to spark energy. They merely possess the illusion of life, nothing more.

IncomingMessages: 終端站上顯示了各種靜止不動的生命體，在工廠黑暗的地底排成一列又一列的隊伍，看不到盡頭。
MONITOR SYSTEM NORMAL... ALL LIFEFORMS WITHIN OPERATING PARAMETERS
它們看起來像吉客族和維金族，眼睛眨也不眨，對周遭看似毫無反應。

Options.Name: Initialise system
Options.Text: I initialise the system, causing the lifeforms below to wake up. They lurch forward, their heads slowly turning towards the camera. They reward me for my assistance in their awakening.

Options.Name: Report to Gek
Options.Text: I report the factory's existence to the Gek authorities. They respond with anger and fear, claiming that this complex and others like it produce 'SynthetiGek', artificial versions of the Gek for espionage and infiltration. They reward me for my assistance.

Options.Name: Report to Vy'keen
Options.Text: I report the factory's existence to the Vy'keen authorities. They respond with confusion, promising to send starships to uncover the factory's purpose.

IncomingMessages: 這座工廠跟我見過的其他科瓦族設施都不一樣。它看起來沒在生產機器或檔案，而是製造一張張奇怪塑膠物質，每一張都布滿一連串精細的小點。
Echoes fade. Origin remains. Start of time, Korvax will persist... Even in face of end. Even before abyss.
看起來像文字，但科瓦族怎會需要如此原始的溝通方式呢？

Options.Name: Shut down production
Options.Text:
The dots on the plastic rolls appear to move as I look at them. No good will come of this place. I shut down production.

Amidst the detritus of the factory, I find some discarded technology. Perhaps it will be of use.

Options.Name: Report to Korvax authorities
Options.Text: I report the factory's existence to the Korvax authorities. They claim that the installation was not for me to see, paying me dearly for my silence.

Options.Name: Steal technology
Options.Text: I attempt to steal technology, but the factory's automated defense systems blast a bolt of energy at my suit instead. Whatever is here, it is not worth the trouble.

IncomingMessages: 工廠空空如也，沒有任何產出。生產線顯然停擺已久。警報聲嗡嗡作響，但原因不明。
Trapped in system... please, help me...
廠內傳來一陣聲音，哀傷而孤寂。

Options.Name: Start production
Options.Text:
I start the production line once more, restarting the assembly of what appears to be Korvax body parts.
After a short time, enough parts have been assembled for a lifeform to rise and thank me profusely for its rescue. I am rewarded for my efforts.

Options.Name: Wipe system
Options.Text: I wipe the system. The error is fixed.

Options.Name: Alert Korvax authorities
Options.Text: I alert the Korvax authorities to their faulty factory. They dispatch a science team to examine the anomaly, thanking me for my trouble.

IncomingMessages: 這座工廠用這個世界現有的資源製造太空船元件。
TRANSFER IN PROCESS: 38% PROGRESS. SEE MORE DETAIL?

這座廠房專為科瓦族的探索用船艦製造零件。這種太空船造型不對稱，對於垂直性與功能性的強調程度，超乎任何有機生物體所能想像。

我仔細檢查終端站，發現正在傳送資料。數據在不同太空船之間遞送，設計圖隨之更動。

Options.Name: Disable process
Options.Text:
I disable the process. The factory abruptly grinds to a halt for a few moments before the process begins anew.
The machine fires a bolt of energy at me when I try to interact again. The console communicates in broken speech, telling me that these ships are not tools to be turned on and off.
The console tells me that Korvax ships are living bodies, just like Korvax bipeds... all contain the souls of the scientist race.

Options.Name: Attempt download
Options.Text:
I attempt to download the data. As I do, a sound emerges from the console, from the walls, from every component in this entire installation...
It is the sound of screaming. The data is mine. I receive nanite clusters to form as I desire.

Options.Name: Wait and watch
Options.Text:
I wait and watch the console.
After a few minutes, the process is complete. I see it then, clear upon the screen: each Korvax starcraft is alive.
Each of their ships has a soul, no different from the bipedal bodies in which they normally stand. I have witnessed the birth of new entities.
